meanings.definition: Characterized by or subject to storms.
meanings.sent1: The stormiest weather I've ever seen made me stay indoors all day.
meanings.sent2: The forecast predicted the stormiest night of the year.
meanings.sent3: The stormiest day of the week coincided with my outdoor picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: Her temper was like the stormiest sea, unpredictable and fierce.
meanings.sent5: The stormiest clouds gathered on the horizon, signaling an impending downpour.

meanings.sent1: It was the stormiest day of the year, with thunder and lightning all around.
meanings.sent2: The stormiest seas are often found in the middle of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The stormiest pet in the neighborhood turned out to be a tiny chihuahua.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were the stormiest, changing rapidly like the weather.
meanings.sent5: The stormiest relationship she had ever been in was with a passionate artist.
